Description.Text:
Position The Cristina Hotel offers comfortable accommodation in Limone sul Garda, a splendid town in Northern Italy, situated on the shores of the famous Lake Garda. This stunning tourist destination offers a diverse choice of beaches, where guests can sunbathe and relax.
Restaurant Hotel amenities include the Benaco restaurant serving delicious Italian and international dishes, a bar with a wide selection of drinks and snacks. Drinks during dinner are included (water, red and white wine, orange juice and coke).
Outside This hotel complex consists of 5 villas (Cristina, Orchidea, Oasi, Calipso and the main building), surrounded by lush gardens from where you can enjoy breathtaking views of Lake Garda. Limone center is reachable with a 15 minutes stroll - there is a hotel shuttlebus at a small charge.

More Informations Among the various activities: pool table, playground, bike hire, excursions, baby sitting, outdoor pool. Services: bike rental, breakfast room, car rental, currency exchange, laundry and ironing service, internet point, room service, Fax / Photocopying.
Check in: rooms are available from approx. 3pm
Dogs allowed small max 10 Kg not in common areas. Air conditioning from 15/06 to 15/09
